name: Nintendo 64 NTSC-J
description: My Japanese N64 in Grape Purple.

name: Super Famicom 1CHIP
description: My Japanese Super Famicom. This is the rare 1CHIP motherboard revision, which is known for having better video quality.

name: AV Famicom
description: My Japanese Famicom. This is the late model AV Famicom - the last model to be released in Japan, which was sold new until as late as 2003!

name: Analogue Super Nt
description: Technically not a retro console, this is an FPGA recreation of the Super Nintendo.
